otherNames: Encouragement of Climb 2nd Season, ヤマノススメ セカンドシーズン
synopsis: Recap: Aoi is an indoors-type girl who is afraid of heights. Hinata likes the outdoors, specifically climbing mountains. So both of them, together with a few friends, start going on ever longer hikes into the mountains. (~ translated and adapted from official site by Cranston)After their previous excursions... will more ambitious mountains await?
